column4: Hi, I have phpmyadmin and phppgadmin installed but when I go to 127.0.0.1/... I dont see them, I think i ned to add shortcuts for them there. how to do that?
you need to create a symlink
yes I know, but how to create it?
cd to /var/www and do
sudo ln -s /usr/share/phpmyadmin phpmyadmin
did it, but still nothing
then you did it wrong
were you in /var/www when you made the link thing
do ls -l in the /var/www directory and make sure the link you made actually works (should be light blue pointing to blue)
did it, and now I see icon in the www directory, but when I try to reach it it gives me permission denied, the owner of the icon in www is root
shouldnt the www directory be owned by www-data
sudo chmod 755 /usr/share/phpmyadmin
no, should be owned by root
I got this chmod: cannot access `/usr/share/phpmyadmin': No such file or directory
then you didn't install the package correctly
thats how I installed it sudo apt-get install mysql-server-5.0
what should be the chmod for the www directory
nothing, keep it as is
I will remove mysql and install it again from the synaptic
phpmyadmin != mysql
nickrud: I will install both from the synaptic
